Message.Msg: ...A note to any self-respecting Republicans, if there are any of you left here on this board… Overnight there were six posts on this board…two by jon (fake echo), two by lew and two by lavender, all of whom repeatedly represent the views of the far right. They began with jon suggesting the President (baracolli – sic) wants a looted big-screen TV, followed by what he considers funny, a suggestion that Travon Martin’s official cause of death was “lead poisoning” – that’s freaking hilarious, jon, if you’re some demented racist, #$%$ clown with an IQ of 14. We then heard lew’s stock advice, followed by him referring to The President of the United States as “a dictator with liver-lips”…certainly no racial connotation there, right? We then get lavender telling Oregonians to arm themselves, followed by a mind-boggling discussion of ancient Birther nonsense from another crackpot, which leads lavender to the conclusion that “we really don`t know who the colored fella is” in reference to the President of the United States. He then suggests that it’s all a preplanned conspiracy aimed at the genocide of the white race and the destruction of The United States, again by “this colored fella.” My question is, what in the world is the matter with you people? Aren’t there any of you out there who are at least moderately sane enough to speak out against this flagrant racism, hatred and scorn for our democracy. Don’t you get tired of being represented by these warped individuals, and if so, how come none of you supposed “moderates” of the right don’t speak up? I’d think folks like jon, lew and lavender are the people you should be trying to rid yourselves of if you EVER hope to have a political resurgence. Lavendar actually said something partially accurate, however, when he said, “WE HAVE REALLY REALLY REALLY BEEN SCREWED…” Yes, you have…if you let these ignorant racists continue to represent what you stand for, you, will indeed be perpetually screwed by the overwhelming majority of Americans who realize we are all in this together. Your continued silence of consent bodes ill for your future. BTW, jon, lew and lav…it’s Free Slurpie Day starting at 11:00, so that should keep you occupied for awhile.
